items.question: How do we start working together?
items.answer: You can contact us through our website form or directly. We'll respond within 24 hours and schedule an initial consultation to understand your needs and provide professional recommendations.

items.question: What are the payment terms?
items.answer: We offer multiple payment options, typically using staged payments: 30% upon signing, 30% mid-development, 40% upon acceptance. Actual arrangements can be adjusted based on project needs.

items.question: Can requirements be changed during development?
items.answer: Using agile development, we can adjust requirement priorities in each Sprint cycle. Major changes will be evaluated for timeline and cost impact and discussed with you.

items.question: How long is the warranty period?
items.answer: Standard warranty is 3-6 months with free bug fixes during this period. After warranty, you can opt for a maintenance contract to ensure long-term system stability.

items.question: Who owns the intellectual property?
items.answer: After project completion and full payment, custom development code IP belongs to the client. We retain the right to use technical experience for other projects without disclosing business secrets.

items.question: How do you ensure project quality?
items.answer: We use best practices including code review, automated testing, and continuous integration. Each phase has clear acceptance criteria to ensure deliverables meet expected quality.
